project_details: Kenko Healthcare App helps users easily track their health and get valuable insights. As health tech develops, apps must be simple and easy to use. We created a simple design that allows users to track heart health, body composition, blood oxygen, and temperature. We also keep medical reports easily accessible for convenience.

The Cesta App is designed to make trip planning easy and stress-free. As travel tech advances, it's essential for platforms to stay simple and user-friendly. We created a specific design that allows users to book flights, reserve hotels, and rent cars all in one place.

The Nexus e-learning app offers flexible, interactive learning anytime, anywhere. As e-learning grows, platforms need to be engaging and easy to use. We designed a simple app for users to follow learning paths, take courses, join live sessions, and earn certificates.

DialinÂ offers a powerful platform for managing business communications. We created an intuitive design that allows users to make calls, send texts, manage contacts, and access AI-powered features like smart replies and call transcripts.
